creator: yoang@free.fr
text:
I've just install apache 2.0.44 on my computer and when the install is done, 
the program opens a Dos windows with
[error] (OS 2)Le fichier specifie est introuvable. : No installed service 
named "Apache2".
i'm a french user...
i've tried with the 98/ME patch but doesn't do anything???

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
was there another service listening on port 80 during installation? In that case
apache will not be installed as service.

you can just install it yourself:

- open your command line
- cd into the apache2/bin directory
- type apache -k install

Andre's comments are dead on; please bring this up on a user support list.
  One open bug is to add port checking at install time, so this is already
  under consideration.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
